title: Epic Energy inks pact with Niva Ecotech to set up 25 MW solar park
description: According to the statement, Epic Energy Ltd, a significant player in the Solar EPC market, has entered into an Agreement with Niva Ecotech Pvt Ltd, (Niva), an established player in the business of setting up Solar Parks to, inter alia, set up a 35 MWp (25 MW) solar park in and around Solapur in Maharashtra.
